reviews.review:
Fantastic puzzle/adventure game with some great humour. 

The game is a major step up from Portal 1 with a longer story, tons of harder puzzles, lots of new game mechanics, great graphics and sound, and some amazing voice acting and humour from Stephen Merchant as Wheatley. A playthrough took me about 10-15 hours to complete. It also adds in co-op mode, which is just as much fun as the main game and I spent a good 100+ hours on that.

An incredible game that everyone should play - 9.5 / 10
portal 3 When?
They copied splitgate

One of the best puzzle games I have ever played, if not the best. The campaing is excellent and long enough. Besides that, you also have a co-op campaign to play with your friend. 

All the puzzles are solvable in a fair way, there's no need for guides or external help but your brains... unless you're like Wheatley.

I recommend this to everyone.

I loved the story line and the puzzles that are difficult, but not entirely hard so that people are able to experience it and still have fun. but by far my favorite part is that the game can somehow run on my laptop so anyone with almost any computer can get it
Très bon jeu évidement

Zum Teil reichlich tricky, aber wirklich prima gemacht!
Schon alleine der schräge Humor und die wirklich coole GLaDOS lohnen sich unbedingt.
Hat zwar schon ein paar Jahre auf dem Buckel, das Spielprinzip ist und bleibt gut.
Räumliches Vorstellungsvermögen und logisches Denken helfen beim Spielen ungemein.
Gehört eigentlich in jede Bibliothek. Spätestens bei einem Sale sollte man zuschlagen.

I really like the series of this game franchise..
Which can develop your brain with original jokes from GLADOS.
I will tell you about the disadvantages of the game.
1] too many puzzles that make it boring to play,
but thank you Glados for seasoning the dull moments into interesting jokes.
2] on the part of the tests from Whitley [Camera 20] - you can use the bug and go through the door.
3] this may be a bug, but in a battle with Whitley, you can jump on it using a portal with helium.
I will tell you about the advantages.
1] Dr. Rattmann's Secret bunkers - which will be interesting to get into.
2] the Puzzles.
3] Interesting achievements.
4] Physics.
5] Thank you for giving away my companion cube
That's all for now.
All hugs...
I advise you to play the game, It will be interesting for you to play.
grv bien

Эта игра произвела на  меня положительное впечатление. Сюжет непредсказуем и захватывающий. Можно строить порталы почти везде. Уже в начале игры ты привязываешься к персонажам и сочувствуешь им. Это игра десятилетия по моему мнению.

Great classic game, super fun with a friend! Many hours of enjoyment.

OVERALL SCORE: 9/10

Game is AMAZING!!! Would totally recomend to someon who wants a puzzle/story based game! Some of the character are just hilarious and honestly, some really did make me laugh! I recomend you buy this game! 10/10
1의 평가를 뛰어넘을 수 있는 몇 안되는 게임. 특유의 음산하고 서늘한 분위기가 게임을 지배하며 1과 마찬가지로 다채로운 퍼즐들이 즐비한다. 스토리는 역시 실망시키지 않으며 갈수록 소름이 끼친다. 퍼즐류 게임으로 분류해도, sf게임으로 분류해도 최상위권에 속하는 명작
timeless classic

Cooles Spiel liebte schon den 1ten teil aber der 2te hat sich selbst übertroffen mann erfährt mehr über Aperture Science und gLaDOs und es ist alles in schönen Map/Level design verpackt. 
Noch dazu kommt das die Commiunity Maps erstellen kann die echt Nerven fressend sein können.
Im Großen und Ganzen ein Super Spiel und ich empfehle es jeden der Rätsel mag.
Amazing Story and Gameplay....Co-op mode....Cheap AF on sale.....What more do you want?

当年阴差阳错错过的神作。尤其是后半程在广阔浩瀚的空间和巨大沉默的物体之间穿梭，加上人工语音和氛围音乐营造出强烈的沉浸感。憋着一点没看攻略通了关，最长的一关卡了两天，解开时真的很有成就感。玩创意工坊时我感觉是个智障。

Que dire au sujet de ce grand classique ?
Il est incroyable, encore plus abouti que le premier épisode et l'on sera content de retrouver les personnages de ce dernier, dont directement reliée à celui-ci.
L'histoire est entraînante, les salles dont la difficulté augment petit à petit vous feront véritablement réfléchir. 

Sans oublier le mode multijoueur là aussi bien fait avec des niveaux supplémentaires qui sauront vous remuer les méninges.
Si vous n'avez jamais joué à Portal, lancez-vous mais commencez d'abord par le premier.
Vous ne regretterez rien !

Portal 2 is my absolute favorite game of all time. A masterfully written game with lovable characters and great puzzles. The dialogue is incredible and so witty and funny. If you've only played the first game and maybe found it a bit lacking story-wise, I'd 100% recommend Portal 2!! :)
